name: Handle_rain
xml: <xml xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'><block type='ef_runevery' id='3;8tud5^1n[)fs#6LLsX' x='238' y='88'><field name='seconds'>60</field><statement name='TIME'><block type='controls_forEach' id='jVHI^Sfz)~6J,7:;{I%S'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field><value name='LIST'><block type='ef_shutter_list' id='J/*4k;3:MW?19%:*AN_}'></block></value><statement name='DO'><block type='controls_if' id='(rTGK}*RrkCOg5wC;twJ'><value name='IF0'><block type='logic_compare' id='X5CJNf}hS(d`8rcoiqLl'><field name='OP'>GTE</field><value name='A'><block type='ef_getcaptorvalue' id='|r+~?-j1Rv4{/o{el4X|'><field name='variable'>humidity</field><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id='7ii/6z0e5U:^aZ8AgIZ,'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></value><value name='B'><block type='math_number' id=';#h0-qn`7ccY@@%];X#I'><field name='NUM'>0.8</field></block></value></block></value><statement name='DO0'><block type='ef_close_shutter' id='z:9d1oq7)u}^+3?SFlDP'><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id='7Z?n}Vx0F@FJGX;}DkzR'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
js: var shutter;Blockly.runEvery(function(60) {   var shutter_list = (EasyFlap.Shutters);  for (var shutter_index in shutter_list) {    shutter = shutter_list[shutter_index];    if ((EasyFlap.getCaptorValue(shutter, "humidity")) >= 0.8) {      EasyFlap.closeShutter(shutter);    }  }});
